msbt.message: Congraps, ! You gotta new room in your house! I sent you a congraplications present. I hope ya wanna decorate your new room with it!
! You got a new room in your house again, huh? That's real neat. One more place to snack, right?! I've sent you a gift to help you decorate or something!
, I see your house got bigger again. What are you feeding it? You can feed it this present if you wanna!
! Two stories! Man! We could play hide-and-seek in your house so easy! I sent you a gift so you can decorate, but we COULD play hide-and-seek instead!
